classification.task_goal: Design and implement a database based on a provided case study.
primary_constraints: All required tables must be implemented using Oracle APEX.
Each group member must submit a copy of the group's report.
Reports submitted late will be capped at 40%.
classification.reasoning: The conversation maintains the core task of designing and implementing a database without any violations of the stated constraints. The user consistently requests specific outputs related to the database design, and the assistant provides relevant information accordingly.
